comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: August 14, 1913 NYT article at query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9907E4DD113CE6... says that a Miss Marie Louise Freese of Los Angeles was the bride of Prince Stanislaus Sulkowski. They set sail for Japan when he was wanted by the police.

comment.author: 25441481@N07
comment._content: The dress MIss Freese is wearing is made of handmade Cluny bobbin lace.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Here is the prince she married: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3682648386/in/p...
